page.title: 12CHARLTON VILLAGE FETE
page.content: On Saturday 13th July 1985, Charlton Village Fete was held on the Playing Field.Some members of the class entered an obstacle course race which was good fun. They won and were presented with a trophy and a cheque for Â£20. Little children could have a ride on a miniature steam train. On sale were crafts, home-made cakes, and ice-creams. There were other side shows and donated items for sale. This is an annual event and proceeds are used to help maintain the Village Hall. The Fete is very popular and everyone has a lot of fun, even those who work hard to organise the event.
